abilities.description: You are equipped with an advanced prosthetic, implant, or mechanical enhancement. When you make a move directly aided by the augment, envision how it gives you exceptional capabilities and add +1. On a strong hit with a match, your augment exceeds expectations; take +2 momentum. On a miss with a match, the augment is broken; you must @Compendium[foundry-ironsworn.starforgedmoves.eece9a67d1961f70]{Repair} and spend 3 repair points to bring it back to working condition.
You are equipped with a second augment. It functions as above, but the benefits of the two augments do not stack.

When you must @Compendium[foundry-ironsworn.starforgedmoves.905205c073b09eac]{Endure Harm} or @Compendium[foundry-ironsworn.starforgedmoves.0cfcd6fbaf6135d0]{Face Death}, you may instead mark an augment as broken. @Compendium[foundry-ironsworn.starforgedmoves.eece9a67d1961f70]{Repair} it as detailed above.
